body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xwI6jg9uaX0
This is my second vanilla mod! It is so much cooler and better than my last.
body_tagged:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xwI6jg9uaX0
This is my second vanilla mod! It is so much cooler and better than my last.
title: My Second Vanilla Mod! (Much Better)

replies.body:
Ehm, You can't say: Vanilla Mod.

Mod = modification, which means you modified the files of Minecraft. You just used codes of files which already existed.

My tip: Change it to Vanilla "Tricks" or something, but not Mod.

Still nice job dude :D
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Very nice and basic. :3 I like it.
replies.body_tagged: Very nice and basic. :3 I like it.

replies.body: That is really cool, nice work man! Maybe to get around the armor stand hassle, would it be possible to use anvils instead?
replies.body_tagged: That is really cool, nice work man! Maybe to get around the armor stand hassle, would it be possible to use anvils instead?

replies.body:
Nope, if you look up any of these one command things on google or youtube I guarantee 95% will say "vanilla mod"
No need to be so technical
